attributes.action: Govenment to launch PSB kids and music pay-TV channel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Govenment should take action to launch the the public service kids and music pay-TV channel.

Despite the large number of channels on offer, UK kids are facing a diminishing choice of programmes as commercial broadcasters retreat from kids commissioning and the BBC scales back.

Live music TV shows are now largely confined to the post-watershed schedules.

To address the probmens govenment should launch public service kids and music pay-TV channel.
